entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 05:49 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
